Package Package

Class ItemStock

java.lang.Object
Package.ItemStock
public class ItemStock
extends java.lang.Object
Keeps track of all items in the store in a HashMap
Version:
May 6, 2021
Author:
Isabelle

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ItemStock()
    Create a new ItemStock object.
    ItemStock​(int id, Item item)
    Create a new ItemStock object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addStock​(int id, Item item)
    Adds an Item to the list of all items
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Item> getItemsList()
    Returns the map of all the items in the store
    Item lookUpItem​(int id)
    Looks up an Item in the stock of Items with its ID and returns it
    void restock()
    Checks stock of all items in the hashmap and if stock of an item is less than 6, restock item's current stock to a value of 50

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • restock

      public void restock()
      Checks stock of all items in the hashmap and if stock of an item is less than 6, restock item's current stock to a value of 50

    • addStock

      public boolean addStock​(int id, Item item)
      Adds an Item to the list of all items
      Parameters:
      id - is the id number of the Item
      item - is an Item object
      Returns:
      true if successfully added, else false

    • lookUpItem

      public Item lookUpItem​(int id)
      Looks up an Item in the stock of Items with its ID and returns it
      Parameters:
      id - is the id number of the Item
      Returns:
      Item

    • getItemsList

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Item> getItemsList()
      Returns the map of all the items in the store
      Returns:
      Map of items
